content.description: You will hear an excerpt consisting of a short piano introduction and four phrases played by cello and piano. The excerpt will be played four times. Before listening to the music for the first time please read the questions.
content.question: The melodic cadences at the ends of phrases 1 and 2 are each decorated with

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

topic.text: 6.1: Embellishing Tones - Identifying Passing Tones and Neighbor Tones

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in performed music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
